meanings.definition: Able to be compacted or compressed.
meanings.sent1: The clothes were so compactible that I could fit all of them in a small suitcase.
meanings.sent2: The foam mattress is compactible, making it easy to roll up and store away.
meanings.sent3: I tried to make a compactible snowball, but it ended up being too fluffy and fell apart.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were so compactible, she could easily organize them into neat categories.
meanings.sent5: The compactible clay was perfect for sculpting intricate details.

meanings.definition: Capable of fitting into a small space.
meanings.sent1: The tiny car was compactible enough to park in the tightest spots.
meanings.sent2: The compactible bookshelf was ideal for the small apartment.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a compactible box to squeeze into and take a nap.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was so compactible, it filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The compactible puzzle pieces clicked together perfectly.

meanings.definition: Able to be easily stored or transported.
meanings.sent1: The foldable table was compactible, making it convenient to carry to the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The compactible backpack was lightweight and perfect for hiking.
meanings.sent3: She had a compactible makeup kit that fit all her essentials in one small case.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were so compactible, he could share them effortlessly with others.
meanings.sent5: The compactible suitcase had wheels for easy transport through the airport.
